## types.Camelize type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Camelize<T> = T extends any[] ? T extends [infer F, ...infer RT] ? [Camelize<F>, ...Camelize<RT>] : [] : {
    [Key in keyof T as Key extends string ? `${CamelizeWord<Key>}` : never]: T[Key] extends object ? Camelize<T[Key]> : T[Key];
};
```
